ciromattia/kcc

Optimizes comics and manga for e-ink readers

View on index

Related repos

  • Comic and manga reader written with Node.js
  • self-hosted server for comics, manga, and ebooks
  • Online document preview for many file formats
  • Desktop app for translating comics using LLMs
  • text-to-image generation model with strong support for Chinese and English prompts
  • translate manga images with one click, supports Japanese, Chinese, English, and more
  • Generative post-keyframing for cartoon production
  • E-ink display for desk telemetry via Home Assistant
  • PostScript code examples, font tools, and 3D graphics
  • Tracks comic collections with financial analytics and mobile browsing
